# Audit Services Contract

## Tender Information

*   **Reference Number:** cb-5952-53284819
*   **Amendment Number:** 3
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-05-30
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-19T12:00:00 (Closed)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-07-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2028-08-31
*   **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

## Project Description

The Senate of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide audit services for the Office of the Senate Ethics Officer. The contract is expected to run for three years, with an option to renew for up to two additional one-year periods. The contractor will be responsible for auditing the financial statements of the Office of the Senate Ethics Officer, as defined in Annex A of the Statement of Work.

## Bidder Information

*   **Trade Agreements:** None
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Contact Information:** 
    *   Name: Shirley Chartrand
    *   Email: proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca
    *   Phone: (613) 995-8888

## Tender Documents

*   **Notice URL:** None
*   **Attachments:** 
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5952/addendum-01_final_e_05312023.pdf
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5952/finpro_rfp_sen-001_audit-seo_05262023_final_e.pdf
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5952/addendum-02_final_e_06122023.pdf

## Selection Criteria

The selection of the contractor will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Please note that the tender is closed, and the selecting authority has made the necessary decision. This entry is for information purposes only.**
**You should not submit an offer.**
